title: Where your best work happens - Flexible co-working spaces
content: We build curated spaces for fast-growing tech companies and talent.                         Singel 542 Kon. Wilhelminaplein 1                                                     From                                                                                                                                        € 1100                                                                                     per office space                                             /                                             per month                                         Or                                                     From                                                                                                                                        € 412.50                                                                                     per desk                                             /                                             per month                                                                                             From                                                                                                                                        € 110                                                                                     per person                                             /                                             per month/excl VAT                                         "TNW’s ecosystem is very useful for us as we can work alongside companies that have similar goals, which creates an interesting and unique environment." "TNW’s ecosystem is very useful for us as we can work alongside companies that have similar goals, which creates an interesting and unique environment."                                         Thomas Moes                                                                             Co-Founder, Homerun                                                         Growing your company means hiring more talent. From developers and data scientists to product managers and marketeers; our residents are looking for people to join their teams. Take a look.                                             Our curated events calendar welcomes industry veterans alongside fast-growing startups. Connect with Google, Salesforce, Amazon, and over 50 startups in residence.                                                                 city                                                                                 15:00                                            →                                            19:00                                                                                 other                                                                                 17:30                                            →                                            20:00                                                                                 city                                                                                 11:00                                            →                                            17:00                                         The heart of tech                     Copyright © 2006—2023, The Next Web B.V.
